title: Jasmine At Work
description: Take a romp with Jasmine the little gray dog as she imagines the fun of going to work like her Mommy! Follow this little Miniature Schnauzer as she dreams about having a real-world job. Kids will love Jasmine's can-do attitude and love of friends and family, and parents will appreciate her ambition and desire to succeed. Join this adorable puppy as she takes on the working world in the first book of the Jasmine Dreams series.
author: Maria Rochelle
